2005 NBA Playoffs Summary

2004 Playoffs Summary 2006 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: San Antonio Spurs

Finals MVP: Tim Duncan (20.6 / 14.1 / 2.1)


2005 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: Tim Duncan (542)

TRB: Tim Duncan (286)

AST: Steve Nash (170)

WS: Chauncey Billups (4.6)
